mapper.insert:
select KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO.nextval from dual
insert into KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER(KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO, MEMBER_NO, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_CONTENT, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_WRITE_DATE, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_SELECTION_ENABLED, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_RECOMMEND) VALUES(#{knowledgeQuestionNo},#{knowledgeAnswerNo}, #{memberNo},#{knowledgeAnswerContent}, #{knowledgeAnswerWriteDate}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: select knowledge_answer_no, knowledge_answer.member_no, m.member_nickname, knowledge_answer_content, knowledge_answer_Write_date, knowledge_answer_selection_enabled, knowledge_answer_recommend from knowledge_answer join member m on knowledge_answer.member_no = m.member_no where knowledge_question_no = #{questionNo} order by KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_SELECTION_ENABLED desc, KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_WRITE_DATE
mapper.update: update KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER set KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_SELECTION_ENABLED=1 where KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO = #{answerNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from knowledge_answer where member_no=#{memberNo}
